description.value: The primary function of the bladder is temporary storage of urine. A second important function of the bladder is secretion of the stored urine at the moment there is cause to do so. These functions can be disrupted due to various causes.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-BladderFunction](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-BladderFunction) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
